timeline.bodyText: Why? This is just a more specific overload of ServerPlayerEntity.sendMessage. Maybe you should instead rename that to sendChatMessage?

replies.bodyText: I see the linked issue now, but it's wrong. All these types of messages still appear in chat. The MessageType parameter is to allow players to turn off certain types of chat messages in the game options.
replies.author: Earthcomputer

replies.bodyText: It's also the location of the message. Game info message type (bed failures, build limit, etc) appears over the hotbar, hence "game message" instead of "chat message".
replies.author: YanisBft

replies.bodyText:
Fair enough, but this message can send messages of all 3 types right? That makes "game message" overly specific. How about:

sendMessage -> sendChatMessage
sendChatMessage -> sendMessage
replies.author: Earthcomputer

replies.bodyText: I don't think the MessageType one can send the actionbar messages.
